room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Glad to see others enjoyed this room but we did not. The clues were ambiguous at best and unlike some of the other reviews I’ve read, the “staff” was not helpful in “nudging” us in the right direction. Unless they felt repeatedly telling us to “use teamwork” in the final 5 minutes was supposed to be helpful. Uhh, thanks for the tip...

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: It was so hard and we couldnt get out! The clues didnt help and it wasnt fun. We just gave up!

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: I've been to escape rooms before and this was the best yet! And the ambiance sets the suspenseful tone! And it was great we solved the "King's Ransom", found King Edward's riches and rescued him from kidnapping.

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: It was so much fun. My friends and I did this for my birthday and it didn't disappoint. The Kings Ransom was the jam!

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: We had a 6pm appointment mid-week. Ended up being perfect because we played King's Ransom in our small group of 3 people. The staff was very welcoming. They were also super helpful if a clue didn't help, they would nudge you in the right direction keeping everything fun.

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Our family had the best time. The six of us were paired with another couple to solve our Kings Ransom. We all worked together and solved it with over 25 minutes to spare. Highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The King’s Ransom" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Amazing! A totally different experience from anything we have here in WV, and so much fun! We decided on the Kings Ransom, and it was pretty awesome. I want to come back and do the Black Widow game very soon!!
